amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Safe Return Program for Alzheimer's patients by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Missing Alzheimer Program by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Wolf.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
